analysis.description:
agame.dealDivedendOfBuyers has external calls inside a loop:
	- _to.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#96-99)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_startCount' of agame. (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#21) is not in mixedCase

agame.decimals (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#15-16) is never used in agame
agame.buyerList_next (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#53-54) is never used in agame
agame.addressList_next (/unique_chucks/24/0xc0ce30001efeb23420d9574ca9f54a8537103c3d.sol#56-57) is never used in agame
